dialogues.name: Mom
dialogues.content: Why did you go out 15 minutes earlier than usual during this period?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Ah... isn't it getting closer to the exam? I want to go to school early to preview.

dialogues.name: Mom
dialogues.content: That's okay, don't be too tired, your health is also important.

dialogues.name: Mom
dialogues.content: By the way, why are you talking in the room every night lately? Who are you talking to?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Uh... I have a classmate who created an online study group, it's like, you know, we can help each other.

dialogues.name: Mom
dialogues.content: Sounds good, but don't go to bed too late.

dialogues.name: Mom
dialogues.content: Go to bed early and focus more on your studies. If I find out you're still playing on your phone late at night, I'll have to confiscate it.
